articles.description: The giant ship has been captured in an image that demonstrates the scale of the Mars-bound ship.
articles.content:
The Starship, SpaceX's under-development ship for sending humans to Mars, has been captured in a new image that reveals its sheer size.
Ahead of a planned static test fire, CEO Elon Musk shared an image on Twitter Monday of the underside of the rocket, with … [+3581 chars]
